means: （做出）机敏的应答，机智的反驳

sentence.Network_en: He is very sharp, a quick thinker and swift with repartee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他非常机敏，反应很快，并且能说会道。

sentence.Network_en: He was acclaimed for his acerbic wit and repartee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以一针见血的妙语巧辩而备受好评。

PerfectNetExp.abs: reparations 赔偿repartee 巧妙的应答-
rejoinder n. 回答repartee n. 机灵的回答response n. 回答，反应，响应
repartee的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... A swift,witty reply. 语源 repartee 巧妙的回答 repartee [罕]巧妙地回答[反驳].
There ' s obviously some kind of repartee going on between Jesus and this woman ., 耶稣和妇人之间的对话明显的有某种机巧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French repartie 'replied promptly', feminine past participle of repartir, from re- 'again' + partir 'set off'

entry.tran: 妙语连珠的对话;机智的谈话
entry.def: Repartee is conversation that consists of quick, witty comments and replies.

auth_sentence.content: There's an emphasis on repartee and wit.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's an emphasis on repartee and wit.

auth_sentence.content: The cabbie...kept up a steady stream of...rapid-fire repartee.
auth_sentence.res_content: The cabbie...kept up a steady stream of...rapid-fire repartee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cabbie...kept up a steady stream of...rapid-fire repartee.

auth_sentence.content: Matt and Kiruna duly began their repartee, even before the recording began.
auth_sentence.res_content: Matt and Kiruna duly began their repartee, even before the recording began.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Matt and Kiruna duly began their repartee, even before the recording began.

sentences.en: This diplomat possessed an excellent gift for repartee.
sentences.cn: 这位外交官具有卓越的应对才能。
